Name: Agent-Uncertainty-Voice-PostCall
Function: {"Version":"2022-11-25","RuleFunction":{"Operator":"OR","Operands":[{"Operator":"CONTAINS_ANY","Operands":[[{"Type":"LIST","Value":[{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"I'm not sure"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"I think"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"Maybe"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"Possibly"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"I believe"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"Could be"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"Might"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"Uncertain"}]}]],"ComparisonValue":"$.ContactLens.PostCall.PatternMatch.Transcript","FilterClause":{"LogicOperator":"AND","Filters":[{"Type":"ParticipantRole","Data":"AGENT"},{"Type":"PatternMatchLanguageFilter","Data":"EN"}]},"Negate":false},{"Operator":"CONTAINS_ANY","Operands":["I'm not sure but","I think it might be","Maybe you could try","It's possibly related to","I believe that","It could be the case","It might be possible","I'm uncertain about"],"ComparisonValue":"$.ContactLens.PostCall.ExactMatch.Transcript","FilterClause":{"LogicOperator":"AND","Filters":[{"Type":"ParticipantRole","Data":"AGENT"}]},"Negate":false},{"Operator":"CONTAINS_ANY","Operands":["I'm not sure but","I think it might be","Maybe you could try"],"ComparisonValue":"$.ContactLens.PostCall.SemanticMatch.Transcript","FilterClause":{"LogicOperator":"AND","Filters":[{"Type":"ParticipantRole","Data":"AGENT"}]},"Negate":false}]}}
